summary:
UPDATED
+++Uploaded new sword design, waiting for feedback.

Adds a modified Iron Greatsword with a modified texture.
Fairly Powerful. Looks nice.
descriptionHtml:
Claymore of Heroes
===================

By: TheNerevar
++++++++++++++++

I enjoy the criticism, and I just attempted to fix a bad example of my knowledge while keeping much of the original design. I hope you like it.

Well, my first Skyrim mod EVAR! YAY!

Just extract the .esp into your data folder. the meshes and texture also need to go to the
right meshes and texture folders.

I\\\'m sure most of you understand.
---------------------------------

This mod:

EDIT: Re-tweeked enchantment. it now acts as a silver and causes bleeding.

It is a modified Iron Greatsword with a modified texture.
It has the stats of an elven greatsword, but it is only 12 pounds (or what ever the weight unit is for on Tamriel)
And it swings nearly as fast as a sword. It shouldn\'t be too powerful, but if it is, I made is a pain to forge. ;)
Requires Advances Armors perk for smithing, or find it in the temporary location (may change in the future,if people provide ideas) 
Temper-able.
======================

Compatibility:

Should be compatible with anything, tried it out on my heavily modded (mainly gameplay) Skyrim; no issues.

------------------------

Also:

If anyone wants to use this in their mods, I believe a creditwould be appreciated, not required.
I\'ve went through much pain and struggling I\'ve went through trying out nifskope for the first time!

If anyone has ideas on how to immersively put it into the game by quest item lists, secret treasure in a tomb, etc, fire away!

If you want to improve the textures, go ahead! Publish that mod! Show the original creator\'s glory!

Upload sceenshots if you wish!
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

THANKS:

I thanketh thee for all your support and awesomeness.

I thanketh Bethesda, mostly for their Elderscrolls games! Epecially III.

God bless

Go forth and be a hero!
author: TheNerevar
